      • insertFavourite

        public int insertFavourite(int userId,
                           int favId)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException
        Insert favourite user into database
        Parameters:
        userId - The user's id.
        favId - The favorite user's id .
        Returns:
        If insert successfully it will return any integer except 0, if unable to insert it will return 0.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.

        favouriteId - The user's id that required to remove from favourite list.

      • getLoginLog

        public long getLoginLog(int userId)
                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Get user's login log.
        Parameters:
        userId - User's id
        Returns:
        Return user's last login timestamp in long - which is not yet converted timestamp from database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws sql exception if there is any connection error.
